amendment.description: Amendment increases funds for grants to distribute firearm safety materials and gun locks by $3 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 18 printed in the Congressional Record to increase funds for grants to distribute firearm safety materials and gun locks by $3,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Grayson amendment (A040) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Grayson amendment (A040) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A040) offered by Mr. Grayson.
